wikitext.*:
'''''hlothram(a)''''' is a [[Westron]] word meaning "cottager". The word contains the element ''hloth'' ("a two-roomed dwelling or hole").<ref>{{App|Translation}}, note on "Gamgee"</ref>

==See also==

*''[[Cotton Family#Etymology|Hlothran]]''
*''[[Cotman#Etymology|Hlothram]]''
